articles.title: How Mass. lawmakers are reacting to the deal that could end the government shutdown
articles.description:
Lamenting the looming loss of health care subsidies, members of Congress from Massachusetts say the deal was a bad idea.

The post How Mass. lawmakers are reacting to the deal that could end the government shutdown appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts lawmakers criticize the government shutdown deal for jeopardizing health care subsidies.
Congress members express concerns over potential loss of funding affecting thousands of residents.
Local health care services may face cuts, impacting vulnerable populations in Boston.

Local support services are mobilizing to assist the affected residents in Dorchester.

articles.title: She went to prison for manslaughter. She was just sworn in on this Maine city council.

Boston residents may see increased discussions on criminal justice reform and candidate qualifications.

articles.title: Here’s what Jon Stewart had to say about the Senate Democrats voting to end the shutdown

articles.title: Boston police ask for help in search for missing 15-year-old
articles.description:
Briyana Jacques was last seen in Dorchester on Saturday.

The post Boston police ask for help in search for missing 15-year-old appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston police are searching for 15-year-old Briyana Jacques, missing since Saturday.
Briyana was last seen in the Dorchester area of Boston.
Community members are urged to assist in locating her for public safety.
